Name: Scandium (Sc)
Details:
Scandium is a chemical element with the symbol Sc and atomic number 21. It is a transition metal and is often classified as a rare earth element, although it is not technically part of the rare earth element group. Scandium is a silvery-white metal and is relatively soft.

It is often used in the production of aluminum-scandium alloys, which are lightweight and have high strength. These alloys are used in the construction of aircraft and spacecraft components.
